Audio.Locality: Road to San Jose del Palmar, Serrania de las Paraguas, Choco
Audio.Author: Andrew Spencer
Audio.Comments: song from the male of a pair leading around an older juvenile: this song given from the top of a medium sized tree. Contra the information in Restall (2006), I believe this vocalization to be the song, and the vocalization in XC 22117 to be the call.
